body_font.label: Font
body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

paragraph_custom_body_font.content: Allow multiple links, each link in a new line. Please upload to [Shopify files](/admin/settings/files) (opens a new window) and paste link here. These formats TTF, OTF, WOFF & WOFF2 are supported.

heading_font.label: Font
heading_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

settings.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

show_new_label.label: Show New
show_new_label.info: You need "Publish date product < Display times". Display times setting underneath

card_low_stock.label: Low inventory threshold
card_low_stock.info: Show inventory quantity in red when quantity is below the threshold. Choose 0 to always show in stock if available.

card_show_rating.label: Show rating
card_show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews/installation)

view_all.label: Show "View all" button if list includes more collections than shown
Show "All collections" button if list includes more collections than shown

height.label: Height
height.info: Height auto is the default mobile layout.

lat_address.label: Latitude
lat_address.info: Latitude coordinate for the map. Example: 47.040182144806664

lng_address.label: Longitude
lng_address.info: Longitude coordinate for the map. Example: 9.667968750000002

marker_address_lat.label: Latitude markers
marker_address_lat.info: Latitude coordinate for the marker. Example: 51.5

marker_address_lng.label: Longitude markers
marker_address_lng.info: Longitude coordinate for the marker. Example: -0.09

custom-liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom-liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

countdown_time.label: Time
countdown_time.info: Set the end of the countdown. Format: MM/DD/YY HH:MM:SS

countdown_time.label: Time
countdown_time.info: Set the end of the countdown. Format: MM/DD/YY HH:MM:SS

countdown_time.label: Time
countdown_time.info: Set the end of the countdown. Format: MM/DD/YY HH:MM:SS

toggle_menu.label: Handle
toggle_menu.info: Go to [admin menus](/admin/menus) -> Select menu -> Get handle

mega_item.label: Parent item
mega_item.info: Enter item name to apply a mega navigation dropdown

overlay.label: Show overlay
overlay.info: Increase text readability on busy images.

position_x.label: Horizontal position
position_x.info: On mobile, content is always centered.

position_y.label: Vertical position
position_y.info: On mobile, content is always centered.

text_align.label: Text align
text_align.info: On mobile, content is always centered.

time_init.label: Time init (Second)
time_init.info: When your site loads, the notification will show after this amount of time.

time_next.label: Time for next display (Second)
time_next.info: Set the time to show the following notification, after the previous one is hidden.

virtual_customers.label: Customers
virtual_customers.info: Separate by "|". If you do not want to use this list of customers, you can write some text. Eg: "someone".

paragraph.content: The Sticky toolbar only shows on mobile devices.

show_index.label: Home page
show_index.info: Popup will display on home page

show_product.label: Product page
show_product.info: Popup will display on product page

show_collection.label: Collection page
show_collection.info: Popup will display on collection page

show_blog.label: Blog page
show_blog.info: Popup will display on blog page

show_article.label: Article page
show_article.info: Popup will display on article page

show_other_page.label: Other page
show_other_page.info: Popup will display on other page

countdown_time.label: Time
countdown_time.info: Set the end of the countdown. Format: MM/DD/YY HH:MM:SS

rate_product.name: Rating
rate_product.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews/installation)

layout.label: Desktop layout
layout.info: Image first is the default mobile layout.

height.label: Height
height.info: Height auto is the default mobile layout.

align.label: Content position
align.info: Content left is the default mobile layout.

button_label.label: Label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

show_image.label: Show featured image
show_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 2:3 aspect ratio.

filter_top.label: Show filters top
filter_top.info: Only use with layout no sidebar

shop_by_price_list_tags.label: Shop by Price list tags
shop_by_price_list_tags.info: Shop by Price list tags is tags in product

show_count.label: Show products count
show_count.info: Only for collection links and filters

rating_info.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews/installation)

info.content: Show customers where they can pick up the product. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/local-methods/local-pickup#show-pickup-availability-to-your-customers)

swatch.label: Swatch
swatch.info: This option only supports the type Button.

swatch_style.label: Swatch style
swatch_style.info: This option only supports the type Button.

swatch_size.label: Swatch size
swatch_size.info: This option only supports the type Button.

dynamic_checkout.label: Show buy now button
dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

custom-liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom-liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

show_count.info: Only for collection links and filters
